formName: Claim a VAT refund as an organisation not registered for VAT

fields.label: Enter your VAT Refund registration number
Enter the postcode of your primary place of business
fields.infoText: This is the postcode you gave to HMRC when you registered for VAT Refunds

sections.title: You are completing a VAT Relief claim for the following registration

fields.label: Select the type that best describes your organisation
choices: Local authority for example, a parish council
optionHelpText: This may include government departments, non-departmental public bodies, NHS bodies, local government bodies, the police and the fire and rescue services.

sections.title: Contact details
sections.description: Enter the details of someone who we can contact if we need to discuss your claim.

fields.label: Select how you'd like to be contacted.

sections.title: Has your organisation's address changed from the last claim?

fields.label: Has your organisation's address changed from the last claim?
fields.errorMessage: Select yes or no for a change of address

fields.infoText:
You must upload a bank statement to verify your details.

 We accept documents in formats like PDF and JPEG (5mb maximum).

sections.title: Have you changed your organisation's bank details from your last claim?

fields.label: Have you changed your organisation's bank details from your last claim?
fields.errorMessage: Select either yes or no for a change in bank details

fields.label: Building society roll number (if you have one)
fields.helpText: Enter the roll number as shown on your card or on statements from your building society

fields.infoText:
You must upload a bank statement to verify your details.

 We accept documents in formats like PDF and JPEG (5mb maximum).

sections.title: What is the start and end date for this claim?
sections.description: Your claim must be for at least one calendar month.

fields.label: Start date
fields.errorMessage: Enter the claim period start date in the correct format

fields.label: End date
fields.helpText: This must be the last day of the month. For example, 31 10 2018
fields.errorMessage: Enter the claim period end date in the correct format

sections.title: How do you want to provide the invoice details?

fields.label: How do you want to provide the invoice details?
fields.helpText: You may find it easier to upload a file giving a summary of all the invoice details if you have 5 or more invoices
choices: Upload a file summarising all the invoice details

sections.title: How many invoices does this claim include?

fields.label: How many invoices does this claim include?
fields.helpText: The number must be between 1 and 50

fields.label: Brief description of goods or services supplied
fields.shortName: Brief description of goods or services supplied

sections.title: Upload a file summarising details for all your invoices

fields.infoText:
You can provide the invoice details in a spreadsheet, PDF or JPEG.

For each invoice, you must provide these details:
* invoice date
* the supplier's VAT registration number
* a brief description of the goods or services supplied
* the name of the organisation that received the goods or services
* the amount of VAT paid
You can only upload one file. The file size must not be more than 15MB.

sections.title: Enter the amount VAT you are wanting to get refunded
Enter the amount VAT you are wanting to get refunded

declarationSection.title: Confirm details and send your claim

fields.label: Email address
fields.helpText: We will send an email to this address to confirm we have received your claim.

fields.infoText:
By entering your full name above you confirm that your organisation:
* is claiming a VAT refund on goods and services that are exempt business activities
* does not make goods or provide services that are subject to VAT
* is not registered for VAT, and if requested, you will produce tax invoices to prove this
This is your last opportunity to print or save a PDF copy of your submitted claim.

We will pay any VAT refund due to the bank account you provided in your claim.

[Contact the VAT Helpline](https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/hm-revenue-customs/contact/vat-enquiries) if you need to make changes to your claim or speak to someone about your claim.
